definitions: in a way that is not firmly or tightly fixed or held together

examples.text: her hair hung loosely over her shoulders
a bow tied loosely at the collar

shortDefinitions: in way that is not firmly or tightly fixed or held together

definitions: in a way that does not fit tightly or closely

examples.text: cover loosely with foil and bake in a preheated oven

shortDefinitions: in way that does not fit tightly or closely

definitions: in a way that is not close, compact, or solid in structure or formation

examples.text: buildings are grouped loosely around a village green
spinach can be packed loosely in a plastic bag

shortDefinitions: in way that is not close, compact, or solid in structure or formation

definitions: in a way that is not rigidly organized

examples.text: discussions were loosely structured to enhance informality
a loosely organized group of collectors

shortDefinitions: in way that is not rigidly organized

examples.text: he moved loosely from side to side

definitions: in a way that is not strict or exact
shortDefinitions: in way that is not strict or exact

definitions: in a careless and indiscreet manner

examples.text: you shouldn't speak loosely outside the group
